result.name: accommodation-qa-scheme-member-database
result.notes: A database of members of the VisitEngland Accommodation QA scheme, with details of attraction name, address and assessment.  Consumers can search for accommodation scheme members at http://www.visitor-guides.com. This site is owned by the publisher Hudsons - the visibility provided by this site is one of the membership benefits of the scheme
result.title: Accommodation QA scheme member database

extras.value: The contractual arrangement with scheme members allows publication by Hudsons, but would require agreement to be given by scheme members before this data could be shared with any other third party / made publicly available.VE will be launching a new corporate website in 2014, and as part of this, could publish some structural details about the scheme (e.g. numbers and types of members)
